traits.name: (Striker) Press the Attack
traits.detail: You have advantage on attack rolls against bloodied targets (under 50% hit points).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.detail: Sydon makes two Electric Glaive attacks.

actions.name: Electric Glaive
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ [damage/2-21.5, d10] slashing damage, plus [21, d20] lightning damage.

actions.name: Stunning Strike
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs. AC. _Hit:_ The target is stunned until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Knockback
actions.detail: A creature within 15' of Sydon must make a [dc-secondary] STR save or be knocked up to 30' away.
